recipesJson.name: Pistachio Almond Ice Cream (LiveMixing)
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is a soft Pistachio Ice Cream with Almond
Made on "Live Mixing: Ice Cream Vapes"
-> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dFwhy1q1v2o

reviews.text: really didn't care for this one, found it to be really light on the flavor, didn't seem on point for the profile you were going for.  thanks for the effort and inspiration though :)

I think I like TPA VB gelato a lot more than TPA VB ice cream. The ice cream is smooth and not overpowering at all which I love. The almond brings a sweetness I didn't expect, especially with the shisha vanilla, they complement each other really well. The thing that is not working for me in this juice is the pistachio. I don't know if it's because I love salty pistachios, although I do love pistachio ice cream, but this pistachio is too sweet, it lacks depth, and we fall back to an almond/nutty ice cream a lot more than a strong pistachio one. I will keep the ice cream base in mind, but I don't think pistachio shines here.

As a SNV, I like it.  Light Pistachio flavor (for me), but still good.  Wonder what would happen if I throw in some Cookie with this?  Wheels spinning.  Thanks for all you and your team do for the community.
